member.name: T:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.CultureSwitcher
member.summary: Switches the current culture to a specific culture then return to the original culture and dispose. Since Localizer.WithCultre has became obsolete, this is a solution to retrive a string from specific culture resource file

member.summary: dispose...

member.name: T:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationExtensions
member.summary:
Add localization support for dot net core web apps with one simple step.
download necessary resource files from: https://github.com/LazZiya/ExpressLocalization.Resources

member.name: M:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationExtensions.AddExpressLocalization``1(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IMvcBuilder,System.Action{LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions})
member.summary:
Add all below localization settings with one step;
define supported cultures adn default culture
Add global route template for culture parameter e.g.: http://localhost:1234/{culture}/xxx
Add route value request culture provider
Add view localization using shared resource
Add DataAnnotations localization
Add ModelBinding localization
Add IdentityError localization
Related resource files can be downloaded from: https://github.com/LazZiya/ExpressLocalization.Resources
member.typeparam: Type of localization resource, this resource should contain all localization messages for Identity, ModelBinding, DataAnnotations localized validiation messages and view localizations as well.
member.param: ExpressLocalizationOptions such as supported cultures and default culture

member.name: M:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationExtensions.AddExpressLocalization``2(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IMvcBuilder,System.Action{LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions})
member.summary:
Add all below localization settings with one step;
define supported cultures adn default culture
Add global route template for culture parameter e.g.: http://localhost:1234/{culture}/xxx
Add route value request culture provider
Add view localization using shared resource
Add DataAnnotations localization
Add ModelBinding localization
Add IdentityError localization
Related resource files can be downloaded from: https://github.com/LazZiya/ExpressLocalization.Resources
member.typeparam: Type of ExpressLocalizationResource, this resource should contain Identity, ModelBinding and DataAnnotations localized validiation messages.
Type of ViewLocalizationResource, this resource is a shared view localization resource.
member.param: ExpressLocalizationOptions such as supported cultures and default culture

member.name: M:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationExtensions.AddExpressLocalization``4(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IMvcBuilder,System.Action{LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions})
member.summary:
Add all below localization settings with one step;
define supported cultures adn default culture
Add global route template for culture parameter e.g.: http://localhost:1234/{culture}/xxx
Add route value request culture provider
Add view localization using shared resource
Add DataAnnotations localization
Add ModelBinding localization
Add IdentityError localization
Related resource files can be downloaded from: https://github.com/LazZiya/ExpressLocalization.Resources
member.typeparam: Type of localization resource for Identity error messages.
Type of localization resource for model binding error messages.
Type of localization resource for data annotations.
Type of localization shared resource for razor views.
member.param: ExpressLocalizationOptions such as supported cultures and default culture

member.name: M:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationExtensions.ExAddDataAnnotationsLocalization``1(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IMvcBuilder,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Add DataAnnotatons localization to the project.
Related resource files can be downloaded from: https://github.com/LazZiya/ExpressLocalization.Resources
member.param: Express validiation attributes provides already localized eror messages

Add ModelBinding localization to the project.

member.summary:
Add shared locaization settings for views
Sample resource files can be downloaded from: https://github.com/LazZiya/ExpressLocalization.Resources

member.summary:
Add IdentityErrors localization to the project

member.name: M:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationExtensions.ExAddClientSideLocalizationValidationScripts(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IMvcBuilder)
member.summary: Add client side libraries for valdiating localized inputs like decimal numbers

member.name: M:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationExtensions.ExAddRouteValueRequestCultureProvider(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IMvcBuilder,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Globalization.CultureInfo},System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Add RouteValueRequestCultureProvider, so localization will be based on route value {culture}
member.param: true to register all culture providers (Route, QueryString, Cookie, AcceptedLanguageHeader), false to use only Route culture provider.

member.name: M:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationExtensions.ExConfigureApplicationCookie(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IMvcBuilder,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Configure application cookie and add culture value to redirect path so unauthorized users will be redirected to login page and the culture will not be lost
member.param: default culture name to add to the path when redirect to login

member.name: T:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions
member.summary: Express localization options

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions.RequestLocalizationOptions
member.summary: Specific options for the Mİcrosoft.AspNetCore.Localizarion.RequestLocalizatonMiddleware

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions.UseAllCultureProviders
member.summary:
Optional, default value true.
true to register all culture providers (Route, QueryString, Cookie, AcceptLanguageHeader)
false to use only Route culture provider.

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions.ResourcesPath
member.summary: The path to the resources folder e.g. "LocalizationResources"

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions.ConfigureRedirectPaths
member.summary:
Optional : Add culture parameter to login, logout and access denied paths.
default value = true
set to false if you need to configure the application cookie options manually

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions.DefaultCultureName
member.summary: The default culture to set during redirection to login event if no culture was set.

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions.LoginPath
member.summary:
The default login path
default value = "/Identity/Account/Login/"

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions.LogoutPath
member.summary:
The default logout path
default value = "/Identity/Account/Logout/"

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions.AccessDeniedPath
member.summary:
The default access denied path
default value = "/Identity/Account/AccessDenied/"

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions.UseExpressValidationAttributes
member.summary: Express valdiation attributes provides already localized error messages. Set to true by default. Set to false if you don't want to use express validation attributes.

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Properties.Resources.LocalizationValidationScripts_jsdeliver
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <!-- cldr scripts (needed for globalize) --> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/rxaviers/cldrjs@0.5.1/dist/cldr.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/rxaviers/cldrjs@0.5.1/dist/cldr/event.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/rxaviers/cldrjs@0.5.1/dist/cldr/supplemental.js"></script>
<!-- globalize scripts --> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/globalizejs/globalize@1.4.2/dist/globalize.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/globalizejs/g [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Properties.Resources.LocalizationValidationScripts_local
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <!-- cldr scripts (needed for globalize) --> <script src="/lib/cldr/dist/cldr.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/cldr/dist/cldr/event.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/cldr/dist/cldr/supplemental.min.js"></script>
<!-- globalize scripts --> <script src="/lib/globalize/dist/globalize.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/globalize/dist/globalize/number.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/globalize/dist/globalize/date.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/globalize/dist/globalize/currency.min.js"></s [rest of string was truncated]";.
